package_solutions_copy: Streamlined, secure, and simple, Digilock makes package storage and fulfillment work beautifully together
juice_solutions_copy: Attractive and convenient Digilock cell phone locker lets guests recharge and relax
package_headline_copy: Digilock design, technology, and reliability come together to deliver customized package management — and new income opportunities
ph_works_list1: Customer or employee places an order online for delivery.
ph_works_list2: Package is delivered straight to a PackageHold™ locker.
ph_works_list3: Recipient receives an email, text, or push notification when package is ready.
ph_works_list4: Recipient uses unique pick-up or QR code to retrieve the package.
ph_why_list1: Less staffing, lower operating cost, higher efficiency
ph_why_list2: Simplified pick-up enhances value for users
ph_why_list3: Convenience and high level security work together
ph_why_list4: Real time reporting lets you track trends and ROI
ph_where_list1: Eliminate the burden of managing deliveries while providing a secure solution for your team.
ph_where_list2: Provide a secure and highly requested amenity for multi-unit properties and residents.
ph_where_list3: Enhance ROI by lowering Last Mile Simplified™ costs and freeing employees to better serve customers.
ph_where_list4: Reduce long wait times and allow faculty and students to conveniently pick up packages on campus.
jb_headline: Power up with peace of mind
jb_headline_copy: Digilock’s compact, secure, and ultra-convenient charging lockers provide the perfect amenity for today’s mobile users.
jb_list2: One-Touch Programming with Mobile App or Electronic Keys
jb_list4: Durable, steel frames with shatter-resistant, tempered safety glass doors
jb_list5: Two sizes: 20 compartment and xx compartment
jb_list6: Comes in standard white with customizable colors
jb_list7: Wall mount installation hardware included or use with pedestal or counter
